about_the_game:
🗡️ Become a Samurai in the Battle for Survival! 🧟‍♂️
2D fighting game set in cyberpunk Japan! Control samurais in battles for 2 to 4 players, fend off waves of cyber-zombies, and enjoy a dynamic synthwave soundtrack. The battle begins!

⚔️ Key Features:

  • Survive in the Arena: Challenge a friend or face off against random opponents in short game sessions to prove your skills!

  • Use the Hordes of Cyber-Zombies: Think you're about to win? Waves of cyber-zombies with different tactics and behaviors will make every battle unpredictable. Use them to your advantage!

  • Arena Boss: Better not drag the fight out, or you’ll have to battle not only your opponents but also the arena boss! But no one has ever managed to defeat the boss...

  • Stylish Graphics: Immerse yourself in the futuristic samurai cyberpunk atmosphere with hand-drawn arenas created by an artist from the board game Arkham Horror.

  • Local Co-op: Gather your friends and engage in intense battles on a single screen.

  • Each Arena, a Thousand Tactics: Use the environment to gain the upper hand, survive as long as possible, and maybe even claim victory.

⚔️ Who is this game for?
If you enjoy fast-paced arcade battles, challenging gameplay, and proving your skills in arena fights, this game is for you! Perfect for evening brawls with friends or solo online matches.

🔥 Ready to Fight?
The cyber-zombies are coming… Grab your katana and join the battle!

[Add to your wishlist and get ready for launch!] 🛡️

content_descriptors.notes: Combat, blood, dismemberment, zombies, murder, mechanical implants, cyber humans, cyber zombies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel, AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel, AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Fight in intense battles against each other in an arena where hordes of cyber-zombies and a final boss add chaos. Prove that you are the strongest! Ready for the challenge?
